name: Services Portfolio
description: Welcome to my web development services portfolio. I am a frontend and backend developer with skills in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, Python, Django, PHP, Laravel, and more. I offer customized web development services and technological solutions for businesses and entrepreneurs. Need a modern and attractive website? A scalable and secure web application? You've come to the right place! Explore my portfolio and discover how I can help you achieve your digital goals.
